text: Lycée Pierre Mendès France may refer to: In France: *Lycée Pierre Mendès France in Ris-Orangis, Essonne (Paris metropolitan area) *Lycée Pierre Mendès France in Vitrolles, Bouches-du-Rhône (Marseille area) *Lycée Pierre Mendès France in Villiers-le-Bel, Val d'Oise (Paris metropolitan area) Outside of France: *Lycée Pierre Mendès France (Tunisia)
title: Lycée Pierre Mendès France
